name: nx-code-coverage
description: Github action for combining/compiling code coverage from an nx monorepo

scripts.package:del: ncc build --source-map --license licenses.txt && find ./dist/lib -mindepth 1 ! -name text -type d -not -path '.' -exec rm -rf {} +
scripts.all: npm run format && npm run lint && npm test && npm run build && npm run package
scripts.build:check: lines=`git diff --ignore-space-at-eol dist/ | wc -l`; if [ $lines -gt 1 ]; then echo "Detected uncommitted changes after build.  See status below:"; diff=`git diff --ignore-space-at-eol dist/`; echo $diff; echo ''; exit 1; fi

gitHooks.pre-push: if [[ $SKIP_HOOKS ]]; then exit 0; fi; npm run all && npm run build:check
